Interface Wall

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleWall, LineWall
public interface Wall
Interface for a collision wall

  • Method Details

    • debugDraw

      void debugDraw(Graphics g, Camera camera)
      Draw the collision hitbox of the wall
      Parameters:
      g - graphics object
      camera - camera object

    • collide

      Pair<Integer,Integer> collide(LineHitbox hitbox, int xVector, int yVector)
      Collide a line hitbox with the wall
      Parameters:
      hitbox - the line hitbox
      xVector - x offset from x position
      yVector - y offset from y position
      Returns:
      the new position of the line hitbox, unchanged if collision occurred

      boolean intersects(LineHitbox hitbox)
